content:
From: Gidon Ernst <gidon.ernst@lmu.de>
Dear colleagues,

(apologies for cross-posting)

We invite solver submissions for the competition on solving Constrained
Horn Clauses (CHC-COMP 2025)

https://chc-comp.github.io/

We kindly ask you to register your solver via this form, the earlier the
better, so we can check for technical issues, but no later than Friday,
April 25:

https://forms.gle/Lh6VmRjRDaknZ4xU9

Solvers will be evaluated automatically on a variety of benchmarks in a
number of categories. For reference, the benchmark selection of CHC-COMP
2024 is available here:

https://github.com/chc-comp/chc-comp24-benchmarks

Best,
Gidon Ernst, LMU Munich
Jose F. Morales, IMDEA Software Institute
